result.title: Invitation to ACM-ICPC Amritapuri Onsite Replay Contest on CodeChef
result.content:
Greetings from CodeChef!

We would like to extend our invitation to you for participating in the ACM-ICPC Amritapuri Onsite Replay Contest and solve the problems featured at the ICPC Asia-Amritapuri Onsite Regionals.

Contest Details: Time: 3rd February 2018 00:00 hrs — 4th February 02:00 hrs Indian Standard Time — +5:30 GMT) — Check your timezone.

Authors: GlebsHP (Gleb Evstropov), Vaibhav Tulsyan, PraveenDhinwa (Praveen Dhinwa), Balajiganapathi S and Akashdeep Nain

Testers: mgch(Misha Chorniy), Animesh Fatehpuria, Triveni Mahatha

Contest link: https://www.codechef.com/AMR17ROL

Registration: You need to have a team and a CodeChef handle to participate. Team Registration Link: https://www.codechef.com/teams/register/AMR17ROL. For all those who are interested and do not have a CodeChef handle, are requested to register in order to participate.

The problems are super interesting and I am sure you all will have a great time while solving these :)

Good Luck! Hope to see you participating!
